blocks.name: ckgen
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the compact generator operation.
blocks.origin: const class ckgen { kGen }

blocks.name: diff.ckgen.s
diff.ckgen.c
diff.ckgen.w
df-kgen
blocks.content: Define the "compact generator", the functor from topological spaces to compactly generated spaces. Also known as the k-ification operation. A set is k-open, i.e. ` x e. ( kGen `` j ) ` , iff the preimage of ` x ` is open in all compact Hausdorff spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgenval
blocks.content: Value of the compact generator. (The "k" in ` kGen ` comes from the name "k-space" for these spaces, after the German word kompakt.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kgenval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cfv(ckgen, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  fvmptd2(hs0, ckgen, c0, crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1)))))), ctop, crab(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wral(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)))))), universe, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  df-kgen(hs0, s0, s1)
  rabeqbidv(s0, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wral(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1))))), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1))))))
  raleqbidv(s1, cpw(cuni(cv(hs0))), cpw(c1), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1)))))
  pweqd(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  sylan9eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c1, cuni(c0), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqcomd(cuni(c0), c1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  toponuni(c0, c1)
  adantl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)))), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1))))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), ccmp, co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eleq2d(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(cv(hs0), crest, cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, crest, cv(s1))
  topontop(c0, c1)
  3syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1)))))), universe), wcel(c1, c0), wcel(cpw(c1), universe))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  pwexg(c1, c0)
  rabexg(s0, cpw(c1), universe, wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(s0), cv(s1)), co(c0, crest, cv(s1)))))))
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cuni(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, cfv(ctopon, c1))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopon, c1)
  diff.ctopon.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, (hs0[|`t]s1)âˆˆ Comp, (s0 â‹‚ s1)âˆˆ(hs0[|`t]s1), (c0[|`t]s1)âˆˆ Comp, (s0 â‹‚ s1)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s1))

blocks.name: elkgen
blocks.content: Value of the compact generator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

thm elkgen(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cfv(ckgen, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ckgen, c0)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))))))
  eleq2d(c2, cfv(ckgen, c0), crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
  kgenval(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, crab(hs0, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))))), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))))))
  elrab(hs0, c2, cpw(c1), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))))
  ralbidv(s0, cpw(c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))
  eleq1d(cin(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), cin(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ineq1(cv(hs0), c2, cv(s0))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))), wss(c2, c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wb(wcel(c2, cpw(c1)), wss(c2, c1)), wcel(c1, c0))
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wral(s0, cpw(c1), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s0)), ccmp), wcel(cin(c2, cv(s0)), co(c0, crest, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm elkgen(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  âŠ¢ (c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1)â†’(c2 âˆˆ(kGen ` c0)â†”(c2 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))))))
  âŠ£ d(s0, c0)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c1)
  âŠ£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  bitrd(c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1), c2 âˆˆ(kGen ` c0), (c2 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))), c2 âˆˆ { hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))})
  eleq2d(c2, (kGen ` c0), { hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))}, c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1))
  kgenval(hs0, s0, c0, c1)
  syl5bb(c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1), c2 âˆˆ { hs0 âˆˆ P(c1)| âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))}, (c2 âŠ† c1 âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))), (c2 âˆˆ P(c1)âˆ§ âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))))
  elrab(hs0, c2, P(c1), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))))
  ralbidv(s0, P(c1), hs0 = c2, ((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)), ((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0)))
  imbi2d(hs0 = c2, (c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp, (hs0 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0), (c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))
  eleq1d((hs0 â‹‚ s0), (c0[|`t]s0), (c2 â‹‚ s0), hs0 = c2)
  ineq1(hs0, c2, s0)
  anbi1d(c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1), c2 âˆˆ P(c1), âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))), c2 âŠ† c1)
  syl(c0 âˆˆ(TopOn ` c1), (c2 âˆˆ P(c1)â†” c2 âŠ† c1), c1 âˆˆ c0)
  toponmax(c0, c1)
  elpw2g(c1, c0, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c1))
  diff.hs0.w(âˆ€(s0 âˆˆ P(c1),((c0[|`t]s0)âˆˆ Comp â†’(c2 â‹‚ s0)âˆˆ(c0[|`t]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: kgeni
blocks.content: Property of the open sets in the compact generator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kgeni(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)), wcel(cin(c0, c2), co(c1, crest, c2)))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cin(c0, c2), co(c1, crest, c2), co(c1, crest, cin(c2, cuni(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)))
  eqeltrrd(cin(c0, c2), co(c1, crest, cin(c2, cuni(c1))), cin(c0, cin(c2, cuni(c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)))
  syl5eq(cin(c0, cin(c2, cuni(c1))), cin(c0, c2), cin(cin(c0, cuni(c1)), c2), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)))
  eqtr3i(cin(c0, cin(c2, cuni(c1))), cin(cin(c0, cuni(c1)), c2), cin(cin(c0, c2), cuni(c1)))
  inass(c0, c2, cuni(c1))
  in32(c0, c2, cuni(c1))
  ineq1d(cin(c0, cuni(c1)), c2, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(co(c1, crest, c2), ccmp)), wceq(cin(c0, cuni(c1)), c0), wss(c0, cuni(c1)))

blocks.name: kgenuni
blocks.content: The base set of the compact generator is the same as the original topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgenftop
blocks.content: The compact generator generates a topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgenf
blocks.content: The compact generator is a function on topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  df-kgen(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs1), ctop), wcel(cfv(ckgen, cv(hs1)), ctop))
  kgenftop(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.c(ctop)

blocks.name: kgentop
blocks.content: A compactly generated space is a topology. (Note: henceforth we will use the idiom " ` J e. ran kGen ` " to denote " ` J ` is compactly generated", since as we will show a space is compactly generated iff it is in the range of the compact generator.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgenss
blocks.content: The compact generator generates a finer topology than the original. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

  a1d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(c0)))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs1)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, crest, cv(hs1))))
  an32s(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), cpw(cuni(c0))), wcel(cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), co(c0, crest, cv(hs1))))

blocks.name: kgenhaus
blocks.content: The compact generator generates another Hausdorff topology given a Hausdorff topology to start from. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

thm kgenhaus(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c0), cha))
} = {
  mpd3an23(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c0), cha), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wss(c0, cfv(ckgen, c0)))
  syl(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c0), cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c0))), wcel(c0, ctop))
  toptopon2(c0)
  kgentopon(c0, cuni(c0))
  syl(wcel(c0, cha), wss(c0, cfv(ckgen, c0)), wcel(c0, ctop))
  haustop(c0)
  kgenss(c0)
  sshaus(c0, cfv(ckgen, c0), cuni(c0))
  eqid(cuni(c0))
}

blocks.name: llycmpkgen2
blocks.content: A locally compact space is compactly generated. (This variant of ~ llycmpkgen uses the weaker definition of locally compact, "every point has a compact neighborhood", instead of "every point has a local base of compact neighborhoods".) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm llycmpkgen2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)))
  -| wceq(c1, cuni(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ctop))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wrex(s1, cfv(cfv(cnei, c0), csn(cv(s0))), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(s1)), ccmp)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(ckgen))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c0, ctop), wss(cfv(ckgen, c0), c0))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(ckgen, c0), c0, w0)

blocks.name: 1stckgen
blocks.content: A first-countable space is compactly generated. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgen2ss
blocks.content: The compact generator preserves the subset (fineness) relationship on topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: kgencn
blocks.content: A function from a compactly generated space is continuous iff it is continuous "on compacta". (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgencn2
blocks.content: A function ` F : J --> K ` from a compactly generated space is continuous iff for all compact spaces ` z ` and continuous ` g : z --> J ` , the composite ` F o. g : z --> K ` is continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: kgencn3
blocks.content: The set of continuous functions from ` J ` to ` K ` is unaffected by k-ification of ` K ` , if ` J ` is already compactly generated. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kgencn3(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wceq(co(c0, ccn, c1), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, c1))))
} = {
  eqssd(co(c0, ccn, c1), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c0, ccn, c1), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, c1))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, cfv(ckgen, c1))), wf(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1)), wral(hs1, cfv(ckgen, c1), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs1, cfv(ckgen, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0))
  eleqtrd(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), c0, cfv(ckgen, c0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ckgen, c1))))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ckgen, c1))), wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cfv(ckgen, c0)), wss(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0)), wral(hs2, cpw(cuni(c0)), wi(wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs2)), ccmp), wcel(cin(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs2)), co(c0, crest, cv(hs2))))))
  syl5sseq(cima(ccnv(cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)), cuni(c0), cdm(cv(hs0)), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ckgen, c1))))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(ckgen, c1)), wceq(cdm(cv(hs0)), cuni(c0)))
  fdmd(cv(hs0), cuni(c0), cuni(c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, crn(ckgen)), wcel(c1, ctop)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, ccn, c1))))

blocks.name: kgen2cn
blocks.content: A continuous function is also continuous with the domain and codomain replaced by their compact generator topologies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm kgen2cn(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c0, co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, cfv(ckgen, c2))))
} = {
  sseldd(c0, co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, cfv(ckgen, c2)), co(c1, ccn, c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  sseqtrd(co(c1, ccn, c2), co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, cfv(ckgen, c2)), co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, c2), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wss(co(c1, ccn, c2), co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, c2)), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wss(c1, cfv(ckgen, c1)))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c1), cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))))
  sylib(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, ctop))
  toptopon2(c1)
  kgentopon(c1, cuni(c1))
  syl(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wss(c1, cfv(ckgen, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
  kgenss(c1)
  cnss1(cfv(ckgen, c1), cuni(c1), c1, c2)
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wceq(co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, c2), co(cfv(ckgen, c1), ccn, cfv(ckgen, c2))), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c1), crn(ckgen)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)), wcel(cfv(ckgen, c1), crn(ckgen)), wfn(ckgen, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))
  ax-mp(wfn(ckgen, ctop), wf(ckgen, ctop, ctop))
  kgenf()
  ffn(ckgen, ctop, ctop)
  cntop1(c0, c1, c2)
  fnfvelrn(ckgen, ctop, c1)
  cntop2(c0, c1, c2)
  kgencn3(cfv(ckgen, c1), c2)
  id(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
}
